log.quotationOne: “Keeping that promise is very important for the girl called Bianka.”
log.quotationTwo: “Could it be you are... Miguel De Cervantes?”

log.quotationOne: “Don't fret, old man! No matter who they are we'll do something about it!”
log.quotationTwo: “20th century... or perhaps 21st——Welcome aboard the 「Caledonia」! ”

log.quotationOne: “This is how Bianka and Rita were able to meet 「Captain Shakespeare」 who came from another world.”
log.quotationTwo: “Happy 17th birthday, adjutant-san”
log.quotationThree: “「The Wall of Asgard」... is what the people who fled to North Africa call that monstrous wall.”

log.quotationOne: “...Drifting in the sea,「life」and「death」have lost all meaning.”
log.quotationTwo: “Manfred Albrecht von Richthofen. Pilot. Fighter pilot of the German Air Force.”
log.quotationThree: “In those「not so bad but not so good」days... I met a certain person.”

log.quotationOne: “I don't know where or when was this. It could all be a weird hallucination.”
log.quotationTwo: “「The way to someone's heart is through their stomach」”
log.quotationThree: “——I will take over as your tour guide”

log.quotationOne: “Before losing consciousness, I smelled something akin to a perfume.”
log.quotationTwo: “I'll go straight to the point. The person you're looking for is not in this library.”
log.quotationThree: “Bianka-sama, from a military point of view your current state of mind is not suited to perform this investigation.”

log.quotationOne: “My name is Alice. Right now... I am in charge of this facility.”
log.quotationTwo: “Woah—— This smell! W-What is this!?”
log.quotationThree: “「This time」 I'll stay. I want to hear 「Alice」's story—— To the very end!”

log.quotationOne: “——I am Erwin Reanna Schrodinger, a dimensional traveler from beyond the abyss.”
log.quotationTwo: “...to destroy them with the robots they are so proud of.”

log.quotationOne: “By learning about what kind of universe we live in we can have a better understanding of the meaning behind the lives that exist within it.”
log.quotationTwo: “Some kind of incident must have happened at this facility.”

log.quotationOne: “Captain Shakespeare, are you trying to pull off something sketchy 「again」”
log.quotationTwo: “Heh, you call this growing up? Isn't he more childish than before?”

log.quotationOne: “Cute girls are the best!! Specially the ones who are too serious but like to daydream and have few friends!!”
log.quotationTwo: “Farewell, my friend, my enemy. Amen.”

log.quotationOne: “As you all know, I'm not the type to adhere to formalities.”
log.quotationTwo: “H-Hey! Don't just throw them at me! Besides, there is no way I can change right here!”

log.quotationOne: “——从哪里来，就给我滚回哪里去！”
log.quotationTwo: “您一定是战神‘布鲁克·查布坦’的人间化身，专程来拯救我们了！”
log.quotationThree: “Next day, 12.19.19.17.18 2-Flint of the Mayan Calendar of Yucatan——”

log.quotationOne: “在那个即将来临的时代里，凡人们也可以通过努力，用自己的双手，创造出种种比肩神明的奇迹。”
log.quotationTwo: “‘纳科姆’是‘超人’。是超越了芸芸众生，忠诚于大地而非上天的英雄。”
log.quotationThree: “我允许你们使用‘艾丝德尔’这个名字来称呼我。”

log.quotationOne: “——这就是父亲告诉我的，有关‘蛇王’的故事。在我十五岁之前，我一直认为那只是虚无缥缈的传说而已。”
log.quotationTwo: “我再强调一遍：无论我、或者其他任何人如何；你，都必须让自己活下去。”
log.quotationThree: “那是光明之神的弃物：一颗魔鬼的心脏。”

log.quotationOne: “你……休想动比安卡大人……一根手指……”
log.quotationTwo: “午安，比安卡大人。这一觉睡得还好吗？”

log.quotationOne: “如果一个人无比渴望在荣耀的战斗中死去……那么他真正应该尝试的，就是看看‘生活’这只怪物，在究竟多少回合之后才能杀死自己。”
log.quotationTwo: “……哦？一击必杀吗？这倒是有点刺激啊。”

log.quotationOne: “小主人，您没有受伤吧？”
“我们追上去吧！这一串脚印似乎还很新鲜！”
log.quotationTwo: “……你这把会说话的剑又是什么来头？”

log.quotationOne: “各位！请务必允许我暂时和大家一起行动，拜托了！”
log.quotationTwo: “……喂喂，这、这说穿了不就是间谍吗？”
log.quotationThree: “共和国自她成立的那一天起，就一直在和敌人打着一场看不到终点的消耗战。”

log.quotationOne: “走吧！我们去山谷的对面——到隧道和要塞去！”
log.quotationTwo: “自我介绍一下：我是共和国的国防部长、也是这座要塞的司令——安娜·查尔斯·达尔文。”
log.quotationThree: “我的声音♬ 你听到了吗♪ 你的微笑♬ 是雨过天晴的阳光♪”

log.quotationOne: “……不要小看演唱会啊，你们这些无知的家伙。”
log.quotationTwo: “我希望你们能利用好锚点的便利性，在这片伟大的土地上多走一走、看一看。”

log.quotationOne: “狮子也会受伤，但狮子不会轻易让人看到自己舔舐伤口的样子。狮子就是狮子。”
log.quotationTwo: “只是，‘时雨绮罗’现在还有一点小秘密不能告诉你们。”

log.quotationOne: “……与其说我没有决定好怎么做，倒不如说我需要整理一下心情来认真面对那个计划。”
log.quotationTwo: “哟。欢迎来到拉帕努伊岛。叫我‘卡拉瓦乔’吧。”

log.quotationOne: “所谓女武神，无论天生的也好，后天改造的也罢——她们都是为了适应和操控崩坏能而被挑选出来的战士。”
log.quotationTwo: “恭喜你，从今天开始有自己的名字了。”

log.quotationOne: “……这件事就交给你了，丽塔·洛丝薇瑟。”
log.quotationTwo: “（嘘——让她睡一会儿吧。）”
log.quotationThree: “——各位，让我们来一次史无前例的大博弈吧！”

log.quotationOne: “……‘破坏世界本身’？这是什么意思？”
log.quotationTwo: “你要知道：不灭者遍及一切；永恒长存者，谁也不能把它毁灭。”
log.quotationThree: “我是时空本身，是摧毁一切的力量之源，我的责任就是将诸般世界归于湮灭。”

log.quotationOne: “就是因为你骨子里是个这么麻烦的人，我才要跟随你把这件事做到底啊。”
log.quotationTwo: “所谓‘老年人’，是不会有什么极其重要的忠告需要对着年轻人‘耳提面命’的。”
log.quotationThree: “女武神从锚点入口的正上方一跃而下。”

log.quotationOne: “每个人都在自己的生命中频繁地抛弃着自己的过去。”
log.quotationTwo: “——因为接下来，会由我来负责消灭这个敌人。”

log.quotationOne: “……为世界上的一切美好而战，究竟意味着什么。”
“生活重归于琐碎，正如永恒的星辰日复一日地东升西落。”
